realTermsForQueryString

public static def realTermsForQueryString(String defaultField, String queryString, Class analyzerClass)

realTermsForQueryString

public static def realTermsForQueryString(String defaultField, String queryString, Analyzer analyzer)

termsForQueryString

public static def termsForQueryString(String queryString, Class analyzerClass)
Returns a list of terms by parsing the given query string - special query characters and words (OR/AND) are not included in the returned list
param:
queryString the query string to parse
param:
analyzerClass the Analyzer Class instance to instantiate, may be null in which case Lucene's
StandardAnalyzer is used
return:
a list of text terms

termsForQueryString

public static def termsForQueryString(String queryString, Analyzer analyzer)
Returns a list of terms by parsing the given query string - special query characters and words (OR/AND) are not included in the returned list
param:
queryString the query string to parse
param:
analyzer the Analyzer instance, may be null in which case Lucene's StandardAnalyzer is used
return:
a list of text terms
throws:
org.apache.lucene.queryParser.ParseException if the query is invalid

termsForText

public static def termsForText(String text)
Returns a list of terms by analysing the given text with Lucene's StandardAnalyzer
param:
text the text to analyse
return:
a list of text terms

termsForText

public static def termsForText(String text, Class analyzerClass)
Returns a list of terms by analysing the given text
param:
text the text to analyse
param:
analyzerClass the Analyzer class to use, may be null in which case Lucene's StandardAnalyzer is used
return:
a list of text terms

termsForText

public static def termsForText(String text, Analyzer analyzer)
Returns a list of terms by analysing the given text
param:
text the text to analyse
param:
analyzer the Analyzer instance to use, may be null in which case Lucene's StandardAnalyzer is used
return:
a list of text terms
